definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: In this paper , the structure of macromaterialogy is discussed and the branching of technological sciences is considered.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论宏观材料学的结构，并思考技术科学的分支。

sentences.english: Significant micro- and macro-adjustments are in the works.
sentences.chinese: 微观面和宏观面的重大调整仍在进行之中。

sentences.english: But it's all mixed up together in a homogeneous, macroscopic fashion.
sentences.chinese: 但是它们在宏观上，以均匀的方式融合了。

sentences.english: Consumption rate is an important macroeconomic index used to reflect economic condition.
sentences.chinese: 消费率是反映国民经济运行状况的重要宏观经济指标。

sentences.english: Between the macroscopic and the microscopic.
sentences.chinese: 而宏观量与微观量之间。

sentences.english: Draft is regulation of directiveness of a policy, put forward from macroscopical angle.
sentences.chinese: 草案是一个政策指导性规定，是从宏观角度提出的。

sentences.english: These are two modes of the direct power supply.
sentences.chinese: 这是宏观上确定的两个直供电模式。

sentences.english: They are derived by use of the ratio of the macroscopic kinetic energy density to the magnetic energy density.
sentences.chinese: 它们是利用宏观动能密度对磁能密度的比例导出的。

sentences.english: Macro structure is the higher level semantic structure of a text.
sentences.chinese: 宏观结构是篇章的高层次语义结构。

sentences.english: Meanwhile the phenomenon of the macroscopic quantum tunneling is also a decay process of metastable state.
sentences.chinese: 而宏观量子隧穿现象同时又是一个亚稳态的衰减过程。

sentences.english: Meanwhile the macro-external environment necessary for the implementation of the shareholding system is pointed out.
sentences.chinese: 文中同时也指出了推行股份制所必要的宏观外部环境。

sentences.english: Liu Cixin's writing evokes the thrill of exploration and the beauty of scale.
sentences.chinese: 刘慈欣的作品唤起了人们对探索和宏观之美的兴奋感。

sentences.english: The results show that macro economic variables have obvious out-of-sample explain ability.
sentences.chinese: 发现宏观经济变量的样本外预测能力仍然相当的显著。

sentences.english: This may sound like buck-passing by the world's main international macroeconomic organisation.
sentences.chinese: 这听起来好像这个国际宏观经济组织在推诿责任。

sentences.english: In fact, the macro-tightening policy has not publicized the outside world so strict.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，宏观紧缩政策并没有外界宣传的这么严格。

sentences.english: But this time, the advent of macro-control.
sentences.chinese: 但是这一次，出现的宏观调控。

definition: aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
